name: SurgePays, Inc.
description: SurgePays, Inc. is a financial technology and telecommunications company that aims to provide underserved communities with access to essential services and products. Founded in 2016, SurgePays operates a proprietary platform that connects consumers to a wide variety of services including mobile phone plans, digital wallets, and remittance services. The company focuses on promoting financial inclusion by providing affordable and accessible solutions to those who may be overlooked by traditional financial institutions. SurgePays has established a strong presence within the prepaid wireless market and aims to expand its offerings to include more financial services, such as banking and payment processing. With a mission to empower individuals and communities, SurgePays is dedicated to bridging the gap in access to technology and financial resources. The company is also committed to leveraging its technology to enhance customer experience and streamline service delivery, ensuring that all consumers can enjoy the benefits of modern financial systems.

seo.meta_title: SurgePays, Inc. | Financial Technology and Telecommunications Solutions
seo.meta_description: Explore SurgePays, Inc. a leader in financial technology and telecommunications, dedicated to providing underserved communities with essential services. Discover our innovative products and mission.

faq.question: What services does SurgePays provide?
faq.answer: SurgePays provides prepaid wireless plans, digital wallets, and remittance services aimed at underserved communities.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of SurgePays?
faq.answer: Brian Cox is the CEO of SurgePays, Inc.

faq.question: Where is SurgePays headquartered?
faq.answer: SurgePays is headquartered in Memphis, Tennessee, USA.
